sub_features.description: Allows users to upload and change their profile picture.
Users can add a short bio or description to personalize their profile.
Enables users to select different themes or color schemes for their profile.
Users can control who can see their profile details.
Allows users to add links to their social media accounts.
Enables users to send and receive messages instantly.
Shows whether the recipient has read a message.
Displays when another user is typing a message.
Allows users to react to messages with emojis.
Supports creating chat groups with multiple users.
Notifies users when they receive a new message.
Reminds users of upcoming events or deadlines.
Notifies users when they receive a friend request.
Alerts users when a new version of the app is available.
Sends promotional offers or news updates.
